SEARCH
Package Game

Class Card

java.lang.Object
Game.Card
public class Card extends Object
The `Card` class represents a game card used in Cards Against Mindera. It can be either a black card (prompt) or a white card (answer).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Card(String content, int cardNumber)
    Creates a new card with the specified content and card number.

  • Method Details

    • splitIntoLines

      public static List<String> splitIntoLines(String content, int maxWidth)
      Splits the content of a card into lines to fit within the specified maximum width.
      Parameters:
      content - the content of the card
      maxWidth - the maximum width of each line
      Returns:
      a list of lines after splitting the content

    • drawBlackCard

      public static String drawBlackCard(String card)
      Draws a black card with a border and formatted content.
      Parameters:
      card - the content of the black card
      Returns:
      a string representation of the drawn black card

    • drawWhiteCard

      public static List<String> drawWhiteCard(String card, int cardNumber)
      Draws a white card with a border, card number, and formatted content.
      Parameters:
      card - the content of the white card
      cardNumber - the unique number assigned to the card
      Returns:
      a list of strings representing the drawn white card
